name: Cynoclept: The Game
description: Cynoclept: The Game is a nightmare brought to life. Kidnapped and kept within an abandoned government base, with no recollection of how you got there, you must escape with your life or be brought to your knees by those who control you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or later Processor: Intel Core i3-3225 @ 3.30GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible Additional Notes: Disk space requirement may change over time.
